content: While resting at the Shrine, note that you can now craft the Spider Celestial Staff, which boasts an odd additional effect against enemies if you're currently poisoned. In fact, you can actually make this into an effective build by intentionally poisoning yourself with the Deathclaw Soak, and further boosting your skills by equipping the Elder Amourworm Spirit to increase critical hit chance when poisoned, but it is a bit of a risky tradeoff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mountain Trail'.
The content is as follows:
While resting at the Shrine, note that you can now craft the Spider Celestial Staff, which boasts an odd additional effect against enemies if you're currently poisoned. In fact, you can actually make this into an effective build by intentionally poisoning yourself with the Deathclaw Soak, and further boosting your skills by equipping the Elder Amourworm Spirit to increase critical hit chance when poisoned, but it is a bit of a risky tradeoff.
